Original_Text: LONDON - Arsenal's new striker scored twice in the second half to secure a 3-1 victory in their Premier League game against Tottenham.
NEW YORK - The Yankees extended their winning streak to five games with a thrilling extra-innings match against the Red Sox.
SYDNEY - Australia's cricket team dominated the first day of the Test match, setting a strong pace for the game.
LOS ANGELES - The Lakers unveiled a new training facility to enhance team activity and performance for the upcoming season.
PARIS - The French Open introduced a revised schedule to allow more recovery time between games for players.
TOKYO - Japan's soccer team prepared for the World Cup qualifier with intense training activities over the weekend.
MIAMI - The Heat's star player returned from injury, boosting the team's performance in their latest game.
RIO DE JANEIRO - Brazil's volleyball team clinched a spot in the Olympics with a stellar performance in the qualifying game.
CHICAGO - The Bulls announced a special fan engagement activity to celebrate the team's 60th anniversary this season.
MELBOURNE - The Australian Open organizers extended the tournament's time period to accommodate more matches and fans.
